message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since it's my turn next round and inflation will hit.
I'll take a bit more since inflation doesn't affect me, but I'm still being generous.
The tables have turned, Bob. Inflation is eating my share, so I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.
Inflation is really hurting your share now, I think it's only fair I take a bit more. You should accept before it's worth even less.
